Docs.summary: Defines a decoder for Microsoft Windows Media Photo encoded images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] is a new codec that provides better image fidelity than [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tla2sharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] with smaller file sizes and more features. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] images achieve lossy and lossless compression by using a single algorithm. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] images support existing metadata standards. For additional information about this format, see the [Windows Media Photo Specification](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx).

## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the decoder is created. The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
